data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hajiqanbar, Hamidreza, Mortazavi, Abdolazim, Khaustov, Alexandr (2019): Two new species of Eutarsopolipus (Acari: Prostigmata: Podapolipidae) parasitizing Syntomus lateralis (Coleoptera: Carabidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 4647 (1): 154-167, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4647.1.13|4 occurrences
